query.name: SELECT_ALL_STRUCTURES
query.default: SELECT STR.STRUCTURE_ID, STR.PARENT_ID, STR.RESOURCE_ID, STR.RESOURCE_PATH FROM CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE STR ORDER BY STR.RESOURCE_PATH

query.name: COPY_STRUCTURE
query.default: INSERT INTO CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE ( STRUCTURE_ID, RESOURCE_ID, PARENT_ID, RESOURCE_PATH, STRUCTURE_STATE, DATE_EXPIRED, DATE_RELEASED) SELECT STRUCTURE_ID, RESOURCE_ID, PARENT_ID, RESOURCE_PATH, STRUCTURE_STATE, DATE_EXPIRED, DATE_RELEASED FROM CMS_${OTHER_PROJECT}_STRUCTURE WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = ?
